title: Unicorn Hatching Rainbow Eggs for Kids - 6 Pack Unicorn Gifts for Boys & Girls, Birthday Easter Basket Stuffers Gift Ideas for Kids 3+ Year Old - Girl Gifts for Ages 3 4 5 6 7 8
features: Magical Unicorn Gifts Set: Unveil the magic with this Hatching Rainbow Eggs Set of 6 Unicorns! Each unicorn comes tucked inside a colorful egg, just waiting for your love and care to hatch. The moment the egg cracks open, you'll be mesmerized by the magical transformation of your very own unicorn! Dive into the magic and let the adventure begin

Watch 600% Magic Grow: Experience the wonder of transformation! Just add water and watch in awe as your unicorn grows up to 600% of its original size over a few days. The anticipation builds as your tiny unicorn evolves into a magical creature full of wonder and excitement

Surprise Every Day: Open one magical unicorn egg each day and enjoy the thrill of a blind box! With 6 different unicorns to discover, each one is unique with its own vibrant colors and features. Which unicorn will you get today? Only the magic can tell

100% Safe and Fun: Crafted with love and care, our unicorn gifts for girls ages 4-8 are made from non-toxic and child-safe materials that meet all international safety standards. Parents can rest easy knowing their little ones are enjoying our safe and high-quality unicorn toys. No worries, just pure, magical fun

Perfect Gift for Kids: Ideal for Christmas, Easter, or even classroom activities, our unicorn toys will bring smiles to kids of all ages. Perfect as stockings, kids' Easter basket stuffers, or a special classroom surprise. Great gifts for 3+ year old boys and girls gifts for ages 3 4 5 6 7 8
description: Product Description Warm Tips – Patience is Key! Within 24 hours , the egg cracks open. By Day 3 , the unicorn begins to grow—keep it submerged to see it expand. By Day 5 , it can grow up to 600%! If water gets cloudy, replace it with fresh water (not exceeding 35°C). Unicorn shrinks back to original size if taken out of water for a few days. You can repeat the fun by soaking it again! Make it fun: Observe the egg’s daily changes with your child or turn it into a ‘mini science experiment’ to learn about water absorption!
